comments:
RC1, Windows 2000


In the PDE perspective, I searched for org.eclipse.jdt.* and got 9 results.
In the SearchView I clicked on Previous Search Results and got a NPE.
In a brand new eclipse installation, after running a File search, and then 
clicking the Previous Search Results I did not get any errors, so this seems 
like a PDE related bug.
Here is the stack dump:
